channel.title: Changing what shops sell? Please help me out.. : l
channel.description: Hi, Im wondering how to change what a shop sells. Ive gone into autospawn and changed all the codes and shop names but that didnt seem to work. What am i doing wrong or what should i be doing? Do i have to edit anything in client java for it to work...? :confused:
